title: Tutorials
introText: Here you can find all of our trainings and tutorials.

tuto.title: Get Started
tuto.desc: The Get started allows you to build, flash, run, and control your very first Luos project.
tuto.author: nicoR

tuto.title: Your First Service
tuto.desc: You just finished Luos get started and you want to go further with Luos: this tutorial is for you!
tuto.author: thomas

tuto.title: Your First Message
tuto.desc: Luos aim to exchange information between services by sending messages. In this tutorial we will learn the message structure and how to send it to another services.
tuto.author: nicoC

tuto.title: Your First Topology detection
tuto.desc: Since the beginning of this training, we discover how to create services, deal with messages and control them using Pyluos. But we never create any embedded application service using other services.
tuto.author: viktoria

tuto.title: Luos with Arduino IDE
tuto.desc: In this tutorial, you will how to set up a Luos-Arduino project on Arduino IDE.
tuto.author: nicoR

tuto.title: Bootloader
tuto.desc: In this tutorial, you will learn to use the bootloader feature offered by Luos technology.
tuto.author: thomas

tuto.title: How to use Luos with FreeRTOS
tuto.desc: If you're used to develop your embedded system with FreeRTOS, you can leverage Luos features without changing the way you design your system. Indeed, Luos fits well with FreeRTOS and this tutorial aims to help you setup your project.
tuto.author: nicoC

tuto.title: How to have flexible and resilient aliases
tuto.desc: Luos provides a flexible way to deal with aliases. In this tutorial, we discover how to configure aliases and how to make the configuration resilient to boot and flash.
tuto.author: nicoR

tuto.title: Develop a connected bike alarm
tuto.desc: In this tutorial series Iâ€™m going to show you how to make your own Luos app using a fully modular bike alarm as example.
tuto.author: nicoR

tuto.title: Create Luos project with PlatformIo
tuto.desc: You heard about Luos, or you have just finished Luos get started and you want to go further with Luos: this tutorial is for you!
tuto.author: thomas

tuto.title: How to make a Morse Encoder
tuto.desc: After the Luos Get started and Trainings, the Luos Morse encoder tutorial is a concrete and fun application of Luos technology.
tuto.author: thomas

tuto.title: Luos with ESP32: ESP IDF and Espressif IDE Setup
tuto.desc: You want to use luos_engine and take advantage of luos network on an ESP32 MCU. In this tutorial, you will learn how to use a simple package button with ESP32 Family.
tuto.author: thomas

tuto.title: Luos with ROS: get started with packages
tuto.desc: Install ROS 2 and get started with packages in a Luos project.
tuto.author: thomas
